pages.text: The culture jar is primarily used to multiply yeasts.$(br2)Put a yeast in a $(bold)Culture Jar$() with its $(l:cellar/yeast)corresponding fluid$(), provide a nearby heat source, and it will grow additional yeasts.$(br2)The culture jar is also used to grow a $(bold)Starter Culture$() for $(l:milk/making_cheese)Making Cheese$().
